TEXT.TITLE: N.Y. BANK DISCOUNT BORROWINGS NIL IN WEEK
TEXT.BODY: The eight major New York City banks did not borrow from the Federal Reserve in the week ended Wednesday March 25, a Fed spokesman said. It was the second half of a two-week bank statement period that ended on Wednesday. The banks did not borrow in the first week of the period. Reuter
